title: Oxford Autumn
description: This charming plaid pattern combines a classic vintage check with playful, hand-painted sports and toy motifs – including a tennis racquet, cricket ball, oars, and a little yacht. Perfect for kids’ apparel, nursery décor, or timeless accessories, it brings a nostalgic, storybook feel to your fall/autumn projects. The soft, muted autumnal/fall palette of sage green, warm cream, and hints of burgundy adds a cosy, heritage vibe, making it ideal for boutique children’s brands or heirloom sewing projects. Great for: kids’ clothing, quilts, wallpaper, bedding, fabric toys, and timeless handmade gifts. Seamless repeat, designed with love and painted by hand using watercolours
